author: Greg
content: Still amazes and disgusts me that these people would trade their honor for whores and hotel rooms and nice meals. It’s great that he didn’t get the appointment, but we citizens are paying him probably close to 200K / year in retirement. Deny him that, and justice would be better served.

author: Bob Jaissle
content: Who is the genius who nominated this guy in the first place? How hard could it have been to uncover his criminal record?
